Event Furniture and Décor

The LaFête Team

Our team is ready to share their years of design and planning experience to ensure every detail of your event is perfect. We go above and beyond to make our customers happy.

Vision

We believe everything is possible through service and hard work.

Mission

Our mission is to be an indispensable resource to our customers by listening, learning and providing exceptional value, every time.

Promise

We promise to provide personalized service with a creative touch making your LaFête experience extraordinary.

Satisfaction

If you ever have a concern, we will make every effort to resolve it to your satisfaction, as your satisfaction is our greatest measure of success.
